answerText: Addis Ababa[10] Addis Ababa is the capital of this country that borders Djibouti and Sudan and contains part of the Danakil Desert in its north east.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Haverford Round 10 | 3 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Besides Dire Dawa, this is the only chartered city in its country. For 10 points each: [10] Name this city which succeeded Entoto as capital and has a name meaning "new flower" in Amharic. It is home to the headquarters of the African Union.
